data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Here to stock up?

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: That everything?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Right.[pause=5] Here's the goods.

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: 'Fraid we're sold out.[pause=0] Come back tomorrow.
data.comment: Buy option, but out of items

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Selling?[pause=5] Alright then...

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: What?[pause=5] But you've got nothing to sell...
data.comment: Sell option, but nothing to sell

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: In case you need a refresher;[pause=5] Dorgan's agreed for me to help keep your team stocked up.

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: You've got a budget of 2 grand per day for goods.[pause=0] Spend it wisely.

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: Or not at all.[pause=0] I 'aint your pa, after all.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Good luck down there.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Don't know how you managed to cram that much stuff in your coat pockets,[pause=5] but this 'aint gonna fit in there.
data.comment: Shop option, but bag is full.

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: You serious?[pause=0] I don't haggle,[pause=5] detective.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: That'll be {0} for that {1}. That good?

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: That'll be {0} for all that. That good?

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Another satisfied customer.

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I'll pay {0} for that {1}. That good?

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I'll pay {0} for all that. That good?

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: I love a good deal.

data.name: Behind_Counter_1
data.value: Oi.[pause=0] Detective.[pause=0] You know the rules.
data.comment: Tried talking to Lawrence from behind the counter.

data.name: Behind_Counter_2
data.value: You want service?[pause=0] We talk OVER the counter,[pause=5] not behind it.
data.comment: Tried talking to Lawrence from behind the counter, 2.
